project_tech_stack.text: WordPress, HTML(5), CSS(3), SASS, JavaScript & jQuery

project_main_text.text: Set up in Soho in 1990, Roxane Vacca Management is a theatrical agency, representing actors in film, television and theatre. I designed and built this site on WordPress with the aim of the design to be classically clean, simple. But primarily for the site to be adaptable, future-proof, and really easy for anyone to update.
